00009 typedef struct tag_cavlc_ref {
00010         int refid[2];
00011         int mv_x[2];
00012         int mv_y[2];
00013         int coeff;
00014         int coeffC;
00015         int imode;
00016 } cavlc_ref;

00018 typedef struct tag_cavlc_ref_list {
00019         cavlc_ref *left;
00020         cavlc_ref *top;
00021         cavlc_ref topleft;
00022         cavlc_ref lefts[4];
00023         cavlc_ref tops[5];
00024 } cavlc_ref_list;

00026 __inline int get_luma_pred(cavlc_ref_list *ref_list, int idx)
00027 {
00028         int row = idx / 4, col = idx & 3, nA = ref_list->left[row].coeff, nB = ref_list->top[col].coeff, nC = nA+nB;
00029         if (nC & 0xC0)
00030                 nC = nC & 0x3F;
00031         else
00032                 nC = (nC + 1) >> 1;
00033         return nC & 0x3F;
00034 }
00035 
00036 __inline void set_luma_pred(cavlc_ref_list *ref_list, int idx, int value)
00037 {
00038         int row = idx / 4, col = idx & 3;
00039         ref_list->left[row].coeff = ref_list->top[col].coeff = value;
00040 }
00041 
00042 __inline int get_mode_pred(cavlc_ref_list *ref_list, int idx)
00043 {
00044         int row = idx / 4, col = idx & 3, nA = ref_list->left[row].imode, nB = ref_list->top[col].imode;
00045         if ((nA&0xC0)||(nB&0xC0))
00046                 nA = nB = 2;
00047         if (nB < nA)
00048                 nA = nB;
00049         return nA;
00050 }
00051 
00052 __inline void set_mode_pred(cavlc_ref_list *ref_list, int idx, int value)
00053 {
00054         int row = idx / 4, col = idx & 3;
00055         ref_list->left[row].imode = ref_list->top[col].imode = value;
00056 }
00057 
00058 __inline int get_chroma_pred(cavlc_ref_list *ref_list, int index)
00059 {
00060         int row = index >> 1, col = ((index & 4) >> 1) | (index & 1), nA = ref_list->left[row].coeffC, nB = ref_list->top[col].coeffC, nC = nA+nB;
00061         if (nC & 0xC0)
00062                 nC = nC & 0x3F;
00063         else
00064                 nC = (nC + 1) >> 1;
00065         return nC & 0x3F;
00066 }
00067 
00068 __inline void set_chroma_pred(cavlc_ref_list *ref_list, int index, int value)
00069 {
00070         int row = index >> 1, col = ((index & 4) >> 1) | (index & 1);
00071         ref_list->left[row].coeffC = ref_list->top[col].coeffC = value;
00072 }

00074 __inline void swap(int &a, int &b)
00075 {
00076         int c = a;
00077         a = b; 
00078         b = c;
00079 }

00089 {
00090         vec.refno = ref.refid[0];
00091         vec.x = ref.mv_x[0];
00092         vec.y = ref.mv_y[0];
